overview:
Sergio Calzado is an entrepreneur and corporate executive for more than 20 years. Current projects include interactive, open source social networks on the web. Primary focus is the origination of “Spreadable Ideas” through the interaction of the world community under a common platform on the www.

His current project Pastica.com and SpreadableIdeas.com is a work in progress, expected launch dates for the .com’s is December 2010. Pastica which stared out with the development of a consumer product line, has morphed and taken a life of its own as “Spreadable Ideas”.

Pastica, pronounced “PAS-TEE-KA”, spanish word for any spread, dip, paste to be used on a cracker, sandwhich, chip, vegetable or any type of food used to dip, taste or spread.

Pastica is a collection of “Spreadable Ideas”. Pastica’s mission is to provide delicious ideas for anything that can be dipped, spread or savoured with a bread, cracker, vegetable, chip or other delectable food dipping tool. Pastica has developed from a great spread idea to a community of spreadable ideas that travel the web without limits reaching out to each individuals ideas, thoughts, taste, wishes and dreams. We encourage the collaboration and comments of all of our visitors and customers. Pastica is all about delicious Spreads, Dips, Jams and everything inbetween.

You may visit current project blogs at:

http://www.spreadableideas.blogspot.com http://www.miamifoodreview.blogspot.com http://www.celebratinglatinfood.blogspot.com
